scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A customer churn prediction model is used to identify customers at high risk of leaving the bank. The model is deployed as a REST API and is accessed by various internal systems and authorized personnel.
